name: funcscan-functional-screening
title: Funcscan: Functional Annotation & BGC Discovery
description: Screen microbial genomes/metagenomes for functional genes: antimicrobial resistance (AMR), biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs), virulence factors. Ideal for pathogen characterization and natural product discovery. Samplesheet format: `sample,fasta`
content:
Funcscan: Functional Screening

Comprehensive functional annotation of bacterial genomes and metagenomes. Identifies AMR genes, biosynthetic gene clusters for antibiotics, and virulence factors.

Applications

  • AMR Surveillance: Track antibiotic resistance genes
  • Natural Product Discovery: Find novel antibiotic BGCs
  • Pathogen Characterization: Virulence factor profiling
  • Metagenome Mining: Functional screening of microbiomes

Key Outputs

  • AMR Genes: AMRFinderPlus, RGI resistance genes
  • BGCs: antiSMASH biosynthetic clusters
  • Virulence Factors: VFDB pathogenicity genes
  • Annotations: Prokka/Bakta gene calls

Perfect for: AMR surveillance • Natural products • Pathogen genomics • Metagenome screening
